name: Rise Above
description: Rise Above is a technical event where participants design, build, and fly radio-controlled aircraft capable of carrying a payload. The aircraft must take off smoothly, demonstrate stable flight, and remain airborne for at least 30 seconds while carrying the load. This event tests creativity, engineering skills, and the practical application of aerodynamics.

name: Hydroblast
description: Hydroblast is an exhilarating water rocket competition where participants apply principles of science, engineering, and creativity to design and launch rockets powered by water and compressed air. The objective is to achieve maximum altitude, flight duration, or precise target landing. This event offers a thrilling, hands-on experience that encourages innovation while exploring key concepts of aerodynamics, fluid mechanics, and propulsion in a fun and competitive environment.

name: TRUSST It
description: IT IS A HANDS-ON CHALLENGE WHERE PARTICIPANTS BUILD STURDY BRIDGES USING MATERIALS LIKE POPSICLES AND CARDBOARD. IT TESTS STRUCTURAL DESIGN. PRECISION,TEAMWORK, AND CREATIVITY WHILE BRINGING ENGINEERING CONCEPTS TO LIFE.

name: Cad Catalyst
description: CAD CATALYST is a challenge to test your mastery in Computer-Aided Design (CAD) — where imagination meets engineering precision. Participants will create and showcase models using leading design platforms such as AutoCAD, SolidWorks, Fusion 360, and CATIA. This event is open to all engineering disciplines, encouraging creativity and technical skills in 2D drafting and 3D modeling. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced designer, CAD CATALYST offers a platform to innovate and bring your ideas to life. Join us to push the boundaries of design and engineering!

name: Doped
description: An exciting event under Instruo, organized by the Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, is designed for the true fanatics of electronics. It offers a platform to explore the fascinating world of semiconductors, circuits, and logical reasoning. The event comprises two rounds: an initial quiz round featuring both technical and aptitude-based questions, followed by an advanced quiz/task round that challenges participants at placement-level difficulty. With a focus on RLC circuits, Digital Logic, and Network Theory, participants are expected to showcase both knowledge and analytical skills. Teams of up to two members can participate, with no calculators allowed to ensure fair play. Accuracy is rewarded through a strict marking scheme, and malpractice will result in disqualification.So, bias your thoughts, hold on to your electrons, and get ready to experience the “dope” world of electronics.

name: Wired In
description: This Event consists of two rounds first round will be a quiz based on the domain of basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering and related Science and second round will be based on your technical skills involving circuits and further details will be given on the spot.

name: Hardness Hustle
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Narrimate
description: It will be a 2-3 min short animated story making competition with the help of AI video generation or anything else, They will write their script and then they will animate it to make a short video Points on the basis of script video style uniqueness.

name: Craft N Cut
description: This is an editing showdown! Whether you're a wizard with transitions, a maestro of montage, or a genius with cuts and color grading, this is your moment to transform raw footage into cinematic gold—all within a challenging time limit. Show off your skills in storytelling, pacing, and visual effects as you compete against the clock and fellow editors. Bring your creativity, technical prowess, and a keen eye for detail to the table. May the best editor win!

name: Chitrakatha
description: Chitrakatha is a unique photography-based storytelling competition designed to bring creativity and narrative skills together through the art of visuals. Participants will be challenged to arrange a sequence of photographs in such a way that they collectively tell a compelling story. Instead of relying on words, the emphasis will be on using imagery, perspective, and sequence to convey emotions, themes, and messages.

name: EOFool
description: EOFool Capture The Flag is an intense 48-hour online hacking marathon that challenges players to hunt hidden flags, unravel puzzles and prove your skill. Compete solo or in teams of up to three as you explore Forensics, Web vulnerabilities, Cryptography, Reverse Engineering and puzzle categories. Each problem hides a flag in the format EOF{...} which must be submitted exactly as shown. The platform uses dynamic scoring so early solves earn more points, and ties are broken by submission time. Register yourself using the Google form, confirm team details, and keep clear notes for post event writeups. Automated attacks on platform infrastructure, targeted disruption, or public sharing of flags are prohibited and may lead to disqualification. This event is designed to teach, sharpen skills and reward creativity. Play fair, collaborate within your team, document solutions, and enjoy the hunt.

name: ODE to Code
description: The ultimate coding challenge, where programming meets precision and problem-solving. This intense team battle will test your skills, speed, and patience as you tackle complex coding challenges. Sharpen your logic and brace yourself for a competition that demands the best from every coder

name: Vicharagni
description: Welcome to the Vicharagni, Instruo’s grandiose deliberation and debate competition. An amalgamation of Oxford Style and British Parliamentary style debate competition with topics ranging from technical, engineering based topics to societal and ethical dilemmas. 3 vs 3 debate with either a team of your choosing or random allotments.Vicharagni aspires to instill critical thinking, mental readiness and proficiency in the technical field in all its participants and observers. Go beyond the horizons and knock new frontiers by joining us for this eventful celebration of intellect and wisdom.

name: Founder's Goal
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Marathon
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Ignite
description: Ignite is a two-round event designed to test analytical and presentation skills. In the first round, participants will be given a case study on a specific topic where they are required to analyze the challenges and propose innovative solutions in written form. Shortlisted participants will then qualify for the second round, where they will prepare and deliver a PowerPoint presentation on a given topic.

name: Battle of Bards
description: There will be 3 (or more) rounds in this event. Participants will get quick prompts, cool puzzles and small challenges. It's all about being spontaneous, thinking smart and having fun. It is a fast and exciting game where they play with words and solve technical clues.

name: Flashmob
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: RoboRumble
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: AEROCRAFT
description: Design and fabricate one lightweight hovercraft, easily maneuverable, quick, and strong. The hovercrafts face each other in an elevated arena with the goal of pushing the other hovercraft off the arena. The last hovercraft remaining on the arena is declared the winner.

name: Robosoccer
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Deathrace
description: Build a robot that can be manually controlled to maneuver across a track with varying obstacles and terrains. The robot must be designed to withstand collisions and navigate through challenging conditions to reach the finish line in the shortest time possible.

name: Robowar
description: Design and build a remote-controlled robot to fight in a tournament against other robots

name: MayDay Mystery
description: Mayday Mystery, the ultimate treasure hunt of Insturo 14.O, challenges your wit, teamwork, and speed as you decode riddles, conquer tasks, and uncover secrets hidden across the IIEST campus.

name: Mathmania
description: Mathemania is a quiz competition designed to test both analytical and creative problem-solving skills in  Round 1 Participants will have to answer questions based on pure mathematics, quantitative aptitude, and logical reasoning. in Round 2 Qualified participants will be challenged to recreate a given image using mathematical equations on Desmos, showcasing their mathematical creativity and visualization skills.

name: War of Titans
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Junkyard
description: Junkyard is a two-round event where participants compete in teams of 2-3 members. In the first round, teams solve an aptitude test consisting of 30 questions on quantitative ability, logical reasoning, and verbal skills within 1 hour. Selected teams advance to the second round, where they are given scrap materials and a problem statement to build a working model or structure within 2 hours. The event tests analytical ability, creativity, and teamwork.

name: BGMI
description: Lorem Ipsum

name: Valorant
description: The Valorant tournament at Instruo will feature teams competing in intense 5v5 matches where strategy, teamwork, and quick reflexes decide the outcome. Each round will test the players’ coordination and decision-making as they battle to eliminate opponents and complete objectives. The event will move through knockout stages, leading to semifinals and a grand final where the best team will be crowned the champion. Exciting prizes and unforgettable moments await both players and spectators throughout the tournament.

name: Fifa
description: The FIFA Showdown is a competitive 1v1 knockout-style gaming tournament conducted as part of the INSTRUO. The event aims to engage participants in a high-energy, skill-based competition centered around the popular football simulation game FIFA  It provides a platform for gamers to showcase their reflexes, strategic thinking, and in-game decision-making under pressure.The tournament will follow a single-elimination format, where players face off in head-to-head matches until a winner emerges. Emphasis will be placed on fair play, sportsmanship, and maintaining a competitive but enjoyable atmosphere throughout the event.

name: King's Conquest
description: King's Conquest is an exhilarating strategy-based gaming tournament where players engage in intense battles to conquer territories and outsmart their opponents. Participants will form alliances, devise tactical plans, and execute maneuvers to dominate the game board. The tournament will test players' strategic thinking, decision-making skills, and adaptability in a competitive environment. With thrilling gameplay and high stakes, King's Conquest promises an unforgettable experience for all participants.
